ygData.subject: Re: Doh
ygData.msgSnippet: Ouchie! There is no known current use for LotGP.  (It used to be used in a quest but that got changed some time ago.) BTW, if you sell some thing to a merch,
ygData.messageBody:
Ouchie!

There is no known current use for LotGP. (It used to be used in a quest but
that got changed some time ago.)

BTW, if you sell some thing to a merch, you can sometimes buy it back. You
may need to buy a lot of stuff from them but they do have a pool of items
that they got from players. If you keep buying from that pool, eventually
you can buy your item back. Might be a whole lot easier to get a lev 50
druid to help you get a new one.

Sylly

p.s. has anyone seen Lord Grimlot recently? I have tried clearing the skelly
camp in SK in an effort to get him to spawn but no luck. Does he only spwan
if the quest is initiated?

p.s.s. Lord Grim used to be part of the old LotGP quest or was that just a
rumor - anyhow that's the connection.


----- Original Message -----
From: <John_Senior@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, February 09, 2000 5:57 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Doh


> From: John_Senior@...
>
> Last night I sold my Lute of the Gypsy princess to a vendor for 3pp. Damn
> game, that was a gift from my guild.
>
> I have heard rumors that this Lute doesn't do anything good, can anyone
> confirm this for me? Might make me feel a little better.
>
> Madagan Songweaver, Bard of 36 (1/2 bub from 37) songs - <Guardians of
> Light>
> Veeshan Server
>
>
